name: Sefil'o
description:
Movement:"A"and "D"

Dash:"Left Shift"

Ulti"R"

Block:"Mouse 1"

Attack:"Mouse 0"

Pot drink/claim:"E"

Click:"Return"

Menu Movement:"W" "S" "A" "D"

If you go to the wise and press the "E" key he will give you a pot.

Your goal is to kill the boss and bring his heart to the wise.
